webpage.para: The GIMP Developers Conference 2004 will be held as a sub-event of GUADEC 5 in Kristiansand, Norway, on the 28th, 29th and 30th of June, 2004.
Our goal is to have all the active GIMP and GEGL developers present to chart a course for the GIMP for the next year and beyond.
We are currently looking for sponsors to help finance the travel and accommodation costs of the developers. If you would like to help us, please contact Dave Neary or Daniel Rogers
